snippet: The computer-generated projection of the dead rapper was unveiled at Coachella on Sunday, but questions remain about a report that it would be taken on tour by Dr. Dre and Snoop Dogg.
abstract: The computer-generated projection of the dead rapper was unveiled at Coachella on Sunday, but questions remain about a report that it would be taken on tour by Dr. Dre and Snoop Dogg.

headline.main: Tupac Shakur Illusion a Hit Online, but Tour Uncertain
